          <title>
            <string language="sl">Rdeči balon</string>
            <string language="en">Red balloon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Roter Ballon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ballon rouge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Balão vermelho</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Κόκκινο μπαλόνι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Globo rojo</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Rdeči baloni na modrem ozadju, kaj je lepše?</string>
            <string language="en">Red hot air balloon on a blue sky. Can it get any better?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">toplozračni balon</string>
            <string language="en">hot air balloon</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="sl">košara</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Roter Heißluftballon auf einem blauen Himmel 
kann es irgendwie erhalten zu verbessern?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ballon à air d'un rouge ardent sur un ciel bleu.
Peut-il obtenir d'améliorer ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O balão de ar quente vermelho em um céu azul 
pode ele começar  melhorar?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'aerostato di aria rovente su un cielo blu può 
esso ottenere affatto migliorare?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το κόκκινο μπαλόνι καυτού αέρα σε έναν μπλε ουρανό 
μπορεί αυτό να πάρει καθόλου καλύτερα;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿El balón de aire candente en un cielo azul 
puede él conseguir mejorar?</string>
          </description>
